text: Robert Roberts Taylor Blyth (2 June 1900 – 1956) was a Scottish professional football player from the 1920s. Blyth was born in Muirkirk, Scotland. His father was a soccer player for Portsmouth, who later became the manager from 1901 to 1904. Blyth played in eight Portsmouth games in the 1921–1922 season. Category:1956 births Category:Footballers from East Ayrshire Category:Portsmouth F.C. players
title: Robert Blyth
